root.name: Adventures in Odyssey! The Treasure of the Inca's
root.description: Story Eugene Meltsner is napping peacefully when a rock is thrown through his window. Attached to the rock is a message that send him and his friends on a zany chase to find his long-lost parents. On his adventure he dicovers a map left by them (His parents) that sends him to Peru looking for the Inca's lost treasure.
